comment: The professor does not teach well and is very tough about the grade. Average is C or below C.

The material was very interesting. The chapter tests (A&B) were by the textbook, some definitions and a few were critical thinking. I found the final to be very difficult, and even thought some of the questions required information outside of the textbook. There were no lectures being an online class, but there were discussions boards every week.

She was very nice. I would take her again. She gave great feedback, encouraging feedback. You have 3 Project sort of things, one is on a website and the other 2 are just creating a survey and interview, I enjoyed it. Then, you have weekly IN DEPTH discussions so youll need to read and understand what youre reading.

AWESOME TEACHER!! Made a difficult class super smooth and easy.  This is a teacher who lovers teaching and will do everything to help you understand the assignments.  Makes class interesting and pushes you to not only understand the subject, but make a good grade as well. HIGHLY recommended.

An A is doable; 20% of ur grade is being present for two lab days,super easy, & coming to class and talking. Grades aren't really given out until the end because she gives u every opportunity to go back and edit your work. It's one semester long project on a topic of your choice, broken down. One midterm online; most of the questions are in the bk.

I love this teacher. She really knows her stuff. As long as you pay attention, take notes, and study for the midterm, you should do fine. The midterm was challenging hard because it covered 6 chapters. For your final research proposal, make sure to choose a good  classmates. She doesn't grade hard. I dreaded going to this class, but I  pass with A

In class assignments, otherwise attendance isn't needed.  Online tests with two days to take it (in a 1 hr sitting). Very happy and friendly all the time with very interactive lessons. Definitely recommend! RENT don't buy the older book though, the newer edition's really the same thing.

Ms. Markley was an amazing professor! I absolutely loved her. I highly reccomend taking her class. Sociology is not by any means a favorite subject by most people, but because of her I came out loving the class. It's fun and interesting and fairly easy. I recommend her to everyone looking for a sociology professor.

AMAZING TEACHER! She works with you to make sure you understand the concepts and gives examples that students are able to identify with and understand. Must go to class and talk-10% of your grade. However, if you mention what you talked about last class at the beginning, that grade shouldn't be too difficult. All tests are online :)

LOVE HER!  She is such a sweet lady and really explains sociology well. I didnt think i would enjoy this class but i decided to make it my minor! VERY easy A, all tests online and a few extra credit assignments! take her!

She is excellent! She really knows what she is talking about and she presents wonderful documentaries that really help drive the point across. She is passionate about what she does and it really shows. Sociology with her is a MUST!

She is wonderful!! Very nice and she tries to make the class very intersting. It is easy to make an A in her class as long as you come to class periodically and speak atleast 80% of the semester. Her tests are open book online and she even gives you a study guide. I definately  recommend her!!

Pretty easy class.  Tests were open-book but beware-- acing the tests is not enough to get an A, you MUST participate in class or you will get a grade significantly lower.  This means being present and participating in discussions.

She is very fun to listen to.  Hard to understand sometimes Romanian.  has accent.  she is helpful and has made the class fun.  Easy A if you read the chapters and study notes and learn the terms to apply not just by definition.
She is excellent. Very interesting and passionate about sociology. Read text and attend class, and you'll do great.

I loved her! She is so sweet and the class was really interesting. Attendance is not completely mandatory, but it does count for a participation grade at the end. All the tests were online so the book helped a lot, I highly recommend her!
Easy class by the book and you will make high B or low A without studing.
I enjoyed the class
I emjoyed the class

Easy enough class.  Scan your chapters as searchable PDFs, and you're guaranteed 95+ on each test.  For the love of god, remember to put an X by your name when you sign in... I had a 95+ average become a B because I didn't know to do that (That's how she counts participation)
Markley is an awesome teacher.  All tests online so buying a book is very helpful.  Attendance is not mandatory every day but a portion of the classes oyu have to attend

Awesome teacher!!! Definitely should take her. She reviews the previous chapter at the beginning of class. Really helpful in preparing for the test. Read the book and pay attention and you'll get an A!! Must take her!!
Great teacher! Makes the material interesting and fun to learn. Very helpful and grades extremely fair. Must take teacher!
She is super nice and very helpful. The class is interesting in general so you will want to go to class. Make sure you keep up with reading the texts, but that's about it!

She is an awesome professor. She really does go over the material well, and reviews it at the beginning of the next class. Studying the text is essential, as well as attendance. But, you won't walk away from this class not feeling prepared for the tests.

loving this class! she tries to help you understand the concepts. make sure you tell her when you dont understand something. tests are tricky. make sure to read the book!!! it helps out a ton on her tests. highly recommend
